comments:
VE build based on Eclipse 20040514 
First part of Test scenario JVECDPAR01: 
 Import inheritance.zip into a project. ?  
  
 Abstract Test  
  
 Create a new visual class which extends AbstractChild. ?Make sure the create 
inherited abstract methods check is checked.  
 Verify the visual representation of this new class is the JSplitPane. (on the 
canvas and the Java Beans View icon)  
 
This does not work and nothing shows on the canvas. The following stack trace 
was in the .log:

The second part of the test also fails using a concrete class instead of an 
abstract class. Seems like a similar error so I'll report it all here. Open a 
separate bug if it's not the same problem. Here's the scenario from 
JVECDPAR01: 
Concrete Test  
  
Create a new visual class which extends ConcreteChild in the default package.  
Verify the visual representation of this new class is a JSplitPane containing 
a JLabel and a JTree. 
Many exceptions are thrown... will attach .log file

Created an attachment (id=11143)
Stack trace from .log

This works fine on the 20040611 build. I think the fix to the VM refresh problem
took care of this as well.
1.0M2 is out, so these are now closed in M2.
